attributes.action: Remove the rest of  flammable cladding on council blocks
attributes.additional_details: So people can be safe and not have to worry that their homes may catch alight like the disaster three years ago in Grenfell
attributes.background: We don’t want another Grenfell to happen, remove the rest of the flammable cladding on housing blocks. Voices are again being unheard

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327176
